scripts.minify: cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/med-components.min.css dist/med-components.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/med-components-tokens.min.css dist/med-components-tokens.css && cleancss -O1 --format breakWith=lf --source-map --source-map-inline-sources --output dist/med-components-grid.min.css dist/med-components-grid.css
